code: import{SET_USER,SET_ERRORS,CLEAR_ERRORS,LOADING_UI}from'../types';import axios from'axios';export var loginUser=function loginUser(userData,history){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:LOADING_UI});axios.post('/login',userData).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);var FBIdToken="Bearer ".concat(res.data);localStorage.setItem('FBIdToken',"Bearer ".concat(res.data));axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization']=FBIdToken;dispatch(getUserData());dispatch({type:CLEAR_ERRORS});history.push('/home');}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);dispatch({type:SET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var getUserData=function getUserData(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/user').then(function(res){dispatch({type:SET_USER,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){console.error(err);});};};
